#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
   int t,x1,x2,x3,x4,y1,y2,y3,y4;
   scanf("%d",&t);
   while(t--)
   {
      scanf("%d %d %d %d",&y1,&y2,&y3,&y4);
      x4=y1-((y1-y3)-(y1-y2));
      x3=-(y4-(-(y1-y2)));
      x1=x3+x4-y2;
      x2=y1-x3-x4;
      printf("%d %d %d %d\n",x1,x2,x3,x4);
   }return 0;
}
